subtitles.transcript: The Legislature has put the — and the governor — has put the university at the edge of a precipice and doesn’t seem to care.
And I think that’s a tragedy, and I think that it will be very sad if this generation of politicians goes down as the people
who ruined the University of California, literally the best public university system in the world,
arguably one of the best institutions in the world. I mean, there’s just not many entities better
than the University of California, and they’re playing with fire with their failure to support the university.
And I don’t think it’s fair to blame the administrators here, because they’re just trying to find a way
to save the university in the throes of the craziness of a political system
that doesn’t seem to think that investing in young people is worthwhile anymore.
